title: Edward Hopper Nighthawks Candle
description:
Candle developed from Edward Hopper’s Nighthawks, 1942 from the Art Institute of Chicago’s collection.

Infuse your ambiance with our mahogany myrrh scented candle.  Inspired by art, our candle is a delight for both the senses and your living space alike. Made in the USA.

  • Dimensions: 3.75 x 4 in.
  • Materials: Paraffin wax, glass jar.
  • Scent: Mahogany Myrrh.
  • Burn Time: approximately 70 hours.
